about_the_game:
Hardtrace is an exciting arcade multiplayer game that brings a new dimension to the world of tron-like and snake-like games. Up to 12 players on a single PC (or more over the network) can compete for maximum points during timed rounds. You drive a "Tracer" vehicle that leaves an intermittent trail of death in its path, and must use your skills and strategy to defeat your friends.

KEY FEATURES

INNOVATIVE MECHANICS:

- Portals: Create and jump through portals across the game board to reach points much quicker than your opponents.

- Instant cornering: Quickly change direction, accelerate, brake and surprise your opponents completely unprepared.

SPECIAL ZONES:

- Two Difficulty Levels: zones with high value points require more precise control and strategy. However, the risk taken is rewarded richly.

- Heated Battles: Inside these zones, everyone wants to be inside as soon as possible, so expect it to be tight.

CLEVER MECHANICS:

- Experience and Understanding of Game Mechanics: The key to winning is to understand and use all the advanced game mechanics. I will only hint that there is a way to get through portals faster than everyone else.

MULTIPLAYER FUN

LOCAL COUCH PARTY:

-Optimized for Big 4K Screens: enjoy the game on modern big TVs.

-Up to 12 Players on One PC: Ideal for large groups and parties (8 Xbox gamepads and nkey rollover keyboard).

HYBRID MULTIPLAYER:

-Couch vs Couch: Play with friends wherever they are with hybrid multiplayer.

PVP AND COOPERATIVE GAMEPLAY:

-Play with Friends or Against Them: online, on the couch and over LAN.

GAME EXPERIENCE

UNIQUE CONTROLS:

-Fast Turning, Braking and Acceleration: Adapt your driving to the situation on the game board.

DYNAMIC PLAYING FIELD:

-Customize the Number of Players: The game board dynamically changes according to the number of players.

INFINITE PLAYING FIELD:

-No Barriers: Edges are not barriers, adding another layer of strategy.

GRAPHIC EFFECTS:

-Minimalist Graphics: Highlights the intense gameplay and provides clarity.

OTHER FEATURES

CHOICE OF VEHICLES AND COLORS:

-Two Vehicle Types and 15 Colors: Customize your Tracer to suit your style.

TOP-DOWN VIEW:

-Full Game Area View: Enables strategic planning and quick reactions.

TENSION AND GRADATION:

-Save Points: points are saved after 10 seconds of not collecting, when a player is destroyed all unsaved points are dropped. Thus, being greedy may not be profitable.

The game is constantly being improved and currently in rapid development, which means you can look forward to new features and improvements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 (AM4)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Full HD (1080p) Monitor 24", ideal with N-Key Rollover keyboard

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4k TV (with game mode) / Monitor 40"+, 2+ Xbox One S or Xbox Series Gamepads

short_description: Hardtrace is an arcade party game for 12+ players. It is fun because you have to be fast and agile and know how to control the chaos. Know which player is greedy and thus the perfect target for your easily earned points:). Understand portals, jump, this will give you an advantage in the whole arena.
